job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Human Capital is a venture firm for engineers. We believe great engineers build great companies, and we invest in founders and startups that share that mindset.
In the last 5 years, that mantra has led us to invest in 10 companies before they became unicorns, including Snowflake, Anduril, Livongo, and Brex (where we wrote the first check). We have over $500M AUM and we've built a network of over 5,000 incredible, driven, ambitious engineers.
Now we're looking for fullstack engineers to help us build our next chapter.
THE ROLE
You’ll join a team of ~5, and partner across the company to build products and systems to maximize impact for our community: engineers, portfolio companies and investors. You’ll report to our Head of Engineering, and have a tangible impact on our culture and business. If you’re passionate about people, entrepreneurship, venture, and tech, we’d love to talk.
YOUR PAST
Ideally 2+ years of industry experience
Experience building and scaling web apps to broad audiences
Knowledge of databases, APIs, and foundation in data science
Comfortable with cloud technologies and continuous deployment
Full stack mentality - comfortable with frontend or backend
Participated in projects with technical and nontechnical stakeholders
Enjoy a fast-paced startup environment
YOUR MINDSET
You thrive in ambiguity and can get going without a spec
You enjoy working directly with end users
You’re scrappy and have an entrepreneurial mindset
You’re data-driven in your decision making
You’re eager to make products that can impact the trajectory of early startups
You love learning about venture capital, finance, and emerging tech companies
